name: Nadir
description:
*Please order through http://www.willowtip.com/releases/ *

The brand new Beyond Terror Terror Beyond Grace album, a departure from the previous grindcore leanings in favour of a more atmospheric death/black/post-metal direction. 

Released April 3rd 2012 through Willowtip Records. 

Tracklist: 

1. Dusk
2. Requiem for the Grey (featuring Rob Allen of Encircling Sea, The Abandonment, In Trenches, Vaiya)
3. Throatless Sirens
4. Nadir
5. Embracing Null
6. The Blood of Time (Featuring Jason Netherton of Misery Index, and Rob Allen)
7. Pathea

Running time: 43:35

Recorded at Three Phase Studios Melbourne May 2011. 

Engineered, mixed and co-produced by Joel Taylor

Additional production by Rob Allen

Additional electronic noise on 'Dusk' by Dave Coen (Encircling Sea, Ivens, Whitehorse)

Mastered by Alan Douches at West West Side Music

Artwork and booklet by Colin Marks of Rainsong Design

Line up:

Blake Simpson - Vocals and lyrics
Scott Heldorf - Guitars
Alex Nicholson - Bass
Steve Smith - Drums, percussion, and samples

name: Logo sticker
description: Band logo sticker, $1 individually but free with any other purchase.

name: Our Ashes Built Mountains
description:
The second Beyond Terror Beyond Grace album, showcasing the grindcore orientated sound the band was formerly known for. Released through Deepsend Records (US) and Obscene Productions (Europe).

Tracklist:

1. 	Mannequins
2. 	Amnesia
3. 	Husk
4. 	Information Scars
5. 	Tumour (Featuring Blake Simpson of Gallows for Grace and current Beyond Terror Beyond Grace vocalist)
6. 	Shadowhalo
7. 	Words
8. 	Exposure 
9. 	Fugue
10. 	Flightless
11. 	Coil (Featuring Anna Vo of Crux)
12. 	Paradigm (Featuring Jarrod Krafczyk of The Amenta/At Dark)
13. 	Hang Them by Their Crowns
14. 	Answers (Featuring Jason Peppiatt of Psycroptic)
15. 	Control
16. 	Aesthetics
17. 	Ashes (featuring Alex Pope of Ruins)
18. 	Pathetic
19. 	Murakami 		 
20. 	Bias 

Running time: 39:12

Engineered, mixed and mastered by Tim Carr at Studio 301 Sydney March-November 2009

Guest vocals by Jason Peppiatt recorded at Crawl Space Studios Hobart by Joe Haley

Additional noise tracks, keyboards and programming by Tim Pope (The Amenta)

Artwork and booklet by Colin Marks of Rainsong Design

Lineup:

Barton Ware - Vocals and lyrics
Ben Schueler - Guitar and lyrics
Alex Nicholson - Bass and lyrics
Steve Smith - Drums, samples, progamming

All orders come with 2 free logo stickers.
